hi!
What do you think is the easiest way to invoke heritrix from my java pr=
ogram?

I found some java code for doing this, from around 2006, that recei=
ves as input an "order.xml" file(SimpleHeritrixLauncher.java). Then, not us=
ing this code, I ran a sample crawl using the WUI and inspected the "order.=
xml" file that it produced. I was surprised to find that the root URL of th=
e crawl did not appear in the "order.xml" file that the execution produced.=
 So I am not sure that this code (SimpleHeritrixLauncher.java) alone can be=
 of any help.

Thank you in advance for your suggestions and opinions.

Nac=
ho
